text.0:
During his Dec. 7 address, President Duterte again singled out @BayanMuna Rep. @kaloi_zarate and tagged him as a "communist."

What are the consequences of red-tagging under the Anti-Terrorism Act of 2020?

Here's a fact sheet: https://t.co/3oGzdmI99p

#VERAfied #factcheckph
text.1: If we are not yet lost in the inertia of the hypocrisy, both books should serve as acute cautionary tales reminding us that, soon, we will be voting in a political system laboring under damning corruption and impunity that have even worsened since 2016. https://t.co/qfn7cDTQJM
